## BootExecutionOptions type

Options for boot() execution

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BootExecutionOptions = {
    booters?: Constructor<Booter>[];
    filter?: {
        booters?: string[];
        phases?: string[];
    };
    [prop: string]: any;
};
```
